item.description:
Happy 2012, AWers~!

 

Come join other artists and creators for a potluck meetup on Wednesday January 11th at 7pm. Bring your favorite food or drink (plus a little bit more to share :) and we will have a group discussion about our projects, goals and forming of new meetups based on Julia Cameron's Artist's Way book series. 

Proposed agenda:

 

7pm Meet, greet and eat!

7:45pm Roundtable discussion - overview of the AW tools (Morning Pages, Artist dates, etc.)  led by the organizer.  Topics: Weekly meetups - days/times; Structure and subjects of meetups (follow the Artist Way 12 week pattern? Read a new book by Julia Cameron? Incorporate monthly artist shares?, for example....)

8:15pm Small group cluster work - either artist share or an activity from Artist's Way

9:15pm MEETUP ENDS

 

I am open to new suggestions for our Spring meetup agenda. For those of you who may be NEW to the meetup, please learn about the book at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Artist's_W...

** As an organizer, I am assisting our regional creative cluster work.  I have been facilitating Artist Way meetups for three years with the goal of supporting groups and individuals who are working their way through the steps of recovering their creativity.  We have worked in different formats (sometimes meeting weekly; sometimes meeting biweekly; sometimes meeting monthly) , but always with the goal of reading progressively through the 12 chapters of the Artist's Way book. **

 

PROPOSED WEEKLY MEETUPS FOR JANUARY-APRIL 2012 -- MONDAYS or WEDNESDAYS  

7-9:15pm (Location TBD --Boston or Brookline)

 

With all best wishes for abundance!!
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the BU Fitness and Recreation Center and ask front desk for directions to Sargent Choice Classroom
item.name: New Year's Artist's Way Start Up POTLUCK
